articles.title: China's Chang'e-6 is carrying a surprise rover to the moon - SpaceNews
articles.description: China’s Chang’e-6 is carrying a surprise rover to the moon China’s Chang’e-6 spacecraft appears to carry a previously undisclosed lunar rover as part of the mission’s far side exploration plans.
